snippet.title: California Escapades // Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3103930/California_Escapades/

In this simulation and adventure game, explore 19th-century Gold Rush California. Join Jim and Emma to build and manage your farm and city. Plant crops, raise animals, construct buildings, complete missions, uncover secrets, and collect treasures. Start your adventure now!

Developed by
@nutspower480
